Posts.Title: High Risk Group? CherieBear CherieBear

Posts.Content: CherieBear wrote: Good morning- I am on the 6 month watch and wait-wait and watch group  :(  I have a question about what is considered to be a family history of breast cancer... My paternal grandmother and her sister both had breast cancer My father and his 2 brothers have an aggressive prostate cancer My grandmother only had sons-no daughters.  Should I consider that I am in a higher risk group?  Thanks so much for your input and time.   Cherie Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: High Risk Group? CherieBear CherieBear
